title: Brazil New Vehicle Registrations
description: Car Registrations in Brazil decreased to 181 Thousand in October from 194 Thousand in September of 2022. Car Registrations in Brazil averaged 109.19 Thousand from 1957 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 420 Thousand in August of 2012 and a record low of 2 Thousand in February of 1957. In Brazil, New Vehicle Registrations refers to total registration of new vehicles, including passenger cars, trucks and buses. This page provides the latest reported value for - Brazil New Vehicle Registrations - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: ANFAVEA, Brazil
